TextField_HelperText-EmailHint: This will be used when signing in, and for account-related operations.
TextField_HelperText-ForgottenPasswordWa: Remember this password. This can be reset but you will lose access to all saved messages and media.
Due to the nature of our service, your password is used to encrypt everything you send to another user. If this is lost we cannot reverse the encryption.
FormStatus-Success: Account Created Successfully. Please Check Your Email.
FormStatus-EmailError: This email is already registered to an account.
FormStatus-RSAKeygenError: Unable to generate keypair (this is BAD).
FormStatus-ServerError: Unable to create account, server died.
